Name: Teagan
Comment: The link Christian posted works for Collection items only whereas in my situation I'd like the last-child to apply to any last page Section inserted by someone who's not me (so they don't have to remember to add a class). Obviously there are ways to do this manually but they require everyone potentially touching the project to remember or know how as opposed to being configured to happen automatically.
